title: Provisional's
body: I was bronze 2 last season and i did my provisionals. Winning 7-3 and i got placed in bronze 5 i would please like to know why i got put into bronze 5 and not into brone 3 or 2

replies.body: Everyone got dropped a lot even the Challenger players. They were Challenger/Master and now there Platinum. (even with 9-1 promos)
The highest rank you can get in Promos is Plat 1, so yes, all the pros dropped because it's impossible getting anything higher.

To add on to this my friend that was gold3 get 5/6 wins in promos now is silver 5
I'm actually scared cause I'm silver 4(in pre season so I think I'm going to bronze {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} )
i was in silver 4 now im dead

._. I can't believe so many people don't know this

Your true rank isn't Bronze 5 3 2 1 or Diamond or Gold its what your mmr is.

Ranked Reset based on Bronze 2  7-3 Prov does not result in bronze 5 you would probably get bronze 1 or silver 5 if you had bronze 2 mmr

Ranked Reset Bronze 2 with really really bad mmr 7-3 Prov = Bronze 5 Yes because your mmr was absolute trash coming into the new season

How much mmr you gain is also based on who you are matched as well but I'm not gonna get into that
The same thing happened to me but I was put in bronze 4. I don't get it either.
